sentences.english: This praise and confidence smote Dobbin's heart very keenly.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的誇獎和信賴弄得都賓十分不好意思。

sentences.english: They praised him to his face.
He smiles when you praise him.
sentences.chinese: 你誇獎他時他總是笑笑。

sentences.english: There are 237 more; a dozen or so are positive.
sentences.chinese: 還有237個評論，一打左右是誇獎的。

sentences.english: He records in his memoir how thrilled he was when Astaire praised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在自傳中寫到自己受阿斯泰爾誇獎時是多麼激動。

sentences.english: Admonish your friend privately , but praise them openly.
sentences.chinese: 要私下告誡朋友，但要公開誇獎朋友。

sentences.english: Too much praise is a weight.
How about an attaboy to Rondo and Perkins?
sentences.chinese: 誇獎一下朗多和帕金斯怎麼樣？

sentences.english: I just don't deserve such praise.
sentences.chinese: 我可當不起這樣的誇獎。

sentences.english: Too much praise is an encumwhein breast supportnce.
I think kids should be praised for genuine accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得孩子要爲自己真實的成就得到誇獎。

sentences.english: The girl flushed from modesty when the man praised her appearance.
sentences.chinese: 誇獎這姑娘長得漂亮時，她羞得臉紅了。

sentences.english: One likes to hear compliments on one's appearance.
sentences.chinese: 人人都愛聽誇獎自己容貌的話。

sentences.english: This means praising not only show-stopping action but also the effort.
sentences.chinese: 這說明誇獎不但可以阻止一些行爲，同是也是努力。

sentences.english: Hippias thinks Socrates is complimenting him.
sentences.chinese: 希比阿以爲蘇格拉底在誇獎他。

sentences.english: What Crabs are really seeking is oral gratification.
sentences.chinese: 蟹子實正須要的是心頭的誇獎。

definition: original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to lift sth up/to elevate sb/to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc)/to show great regard/to speak highly/Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]
